trans-unit.source: Code sample: Retry logic in C# for connecting to SQL Database | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Code sample: Retry logic in C# for connecting to SQL Database | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: C# sample includes robust retry logic for interacting with Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: C# sample includes robust retry logic for interacting with Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides a C# code sample that demonstrates custom retry logic.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides a C# code sample that demonstrates custom retry logic.

trans-unit.source: The retry logic is designed to gracefully process temporary errors or transient faults that tend to go away if the program waits a few seconds and retries.
trans-unit.target: The retry logic is designed to gracefully process temporary errors or transient faults that tend to go away if the program waits a few seconds and retries.

trans-unit.source: ADO.NET classes that you use to connect to your local Microsoft SQL Server can also connect to Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: ADO.NET classes that you use to connect to your local Microsoft SQL Server can also connect to Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: However, by themselves the ADO.NET classes cannot provide all the robustness and reliability necessary in production use.
trans-unit.target: However, by themselves the ADO.NET classes cannot provide all the robustness and reliability necessary in production use.

trans-unit.source: Your client program can encounter transient faults from which it should silently and gracefully recover on its own.
trans-unit.target: Your client program can encounter transient faults from which it should silently and gracefully recover on its own.

trans-unit.source: A couple examples of transient faults:
trans-unit.target: A couple examples of transient faults:

trans-unit.source: A connection over the Internet is subject to brief network outages, after which the connection can be recreated.
trans-unit.target: A connection over the Internet is subject to brief network outages, after which the connection can be recreated.

trans-unit.source: Cloud computing involves load balancing which can briefly block attempts to connect or query.
trans-unit.target: Cloud computing involves load balancing which can briefly block attempts to connect or query.

trans-unit.source: Your program must distinguish between transient errors versus persistent errors.
trans-unit.target: Your program must distinguish between transient errors versus persistent errors.

trans-unit.source: If you program has a misspelling of the target database name, the "No such database found" error will persist and will reoccur every time you rerun the program.
trans-unit.target: If you program has a misspelling of the target database name, the "No such database found" error will persist and will reoccur every time you rerun the program.

trans-unit.source: The list of error numbers that are categorized as transient faults is available at:
trans-unit.target: The list of error numbers that are categorized as transient faults is available at:

trans-unit.source: [Error messages for SQL Database client programs](sql-database-develop-error-messages.md#bkmkconnectionerrors)
trans-unit.target: [Error messages for SQL Database client programs](sql-database-develop-error-messages.md#bkmkconnectionerrors)

trans-unit.source: See the section about Transient Errors, Connection-Loss Errors.
trans-unit.target: See the section about Transient Errors, Connection-Loss Errors.

trans-unit.source: The C# code sample in the present topic contains custom detection and retry logic to handle transient errors.
trans-unit.target: The C# code sample in the present topic contains custom detection and retry logic to handle transient errors.

trans-unit.source: The code sample follows a few basic guidelines or recommendations that apply regardless of which technology you use to interact with Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The code sample follows a few basic guidelines or recommendations that apply regardless of which technology you use to interact with Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: You can see the general recommendations at:
trans-unit.target: You can see the general recommendations at:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Connecting to SQL Database: Links, Best Practices and Design Guidelines</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Connecting to SQL Database: Links, Best Practices and Design Guidelines</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The C# code sample consists of the two .cs files whose content is pasted into the sections that follow.
trans-unit.target: The C# code sample consists of the two .cs files whose content is pasted into the sections that follow.

trans-unit.source: Their file names are:
trans-unit.target: Their file names are:

trans-unit.source: Program.cs
trans-unit.target: Program.cs

trans-unit.source: Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs
trans-unit.target: Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs

trans-unit.source: You can compile the sample with the following steps:
trans-unit.target: You can compile the sample with the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, create a new project from the C# Console Application template.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, create a new project from the C# Console Application template.

trans-unit.source: Right-click your project, and then add the .cs for which source code is provided in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Right-click your project, and then add the .cs for which source code is provided in this topic.

trans-unit.source: In a cmd.exe command window, run the program as shown next.
trans-unit.target: In a cmd.exe command window, run the program as shown next.

trans-unit.source: Actual output from a run is also shown.
trans-unit.target: Actual output from a run is also shown.

trans-unit.source: ConsoleApplication1.exe databasefirewallrulestable 245575913 filestreamtombstone2073058421 2073058421 filetableupdates_2105058535 2105058535
trans-unit.target: ConsoleApplication1.exe databasefirewallrulestable 245575913 filestreamtombstone2073058421 2073058421 filetableupdates_2105058535 2105058535

trans-unit.source: The C# source code for the .cs files are in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: The C# source code for the .cs files are in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: The demo program is designed so that:
trans-unit.target: The demo program is designed so that:

trans-unit.source: A transient fault during an attempt to connect leads to a retry.
trans-unit.target: A transient fault during an attempt to connect leads to a retry.

trans-unit.source: A transient error during a query command causes the program to discard the connection and create a new connection, before retrying the query command.
trans-unit.target: A transient error during a query command causes the program to discard the connection and create a new connection, before retrying the query command.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft neither recommends nor dis-recommends this design choice.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft neither recommends nor dis-recommends this design choice.

trans-unit.source: The demo program illustrates some of the design flexibility that is available to you.
trans-unit.target: The demo program illustrates some of the design flexibility that is available to you.

trans-unit.source: The long length of the Program.cs file is due mostly to the logic that catches exceptions.
trans-unit.target: The long length of the Program.cs file is due mostly to the logic that catches exceptions.

trans-unit.source: A [shorter version](#shorterprogramcs) of this Program.cs file is presented at the end in this topic, with all the retry logic and Exception handling removed.
trans-unit.target: A [shorter version](#shorterprogramcs) of this Program.cs file is presented at the end in this topic, with all the retry logic and Exception handling removed.

trans-unit.source: The Main method is in Program.cs.
trans-unit.target: The Main method is in Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: The call stack runs as follows:
trans-unit.target: The call stack runs as follows:

trans-unit.source: Main calls ConnectAndQuery.
trans-unit.target: Main calls ConnectAndQuery.

trans-unit.source: ConnectAndQuery calls EstablishConnection.
trans-unit.target: ConnectAndQuery calls EstablishConnection.

trans-unit.source: EstablishConnection calls IssueQueryCommand.
trans-unit.target: EstablishConnection calls IssueQueryCommand.

trans-unit.source: [SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.practices.enterpriselibrary.transientfaulthandling.sqldatabasetransienterrordetectionstrategy.aspx) is a class in the Enterprise Library (EntLib) API.
trans-unit.target: [SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.practices.enterpriselibrary.transientfaulthandling.sqldatabasetransienterrordetectionstrategy.aspx) is a class in the Enterprise Library (EntLib) API.

trans-unit.source: The present code sample uses the following custom class that borrows the idea of the EntLib class.
trans-unit.target: The present code sample uses the following custom class that borrows the idea of the EntLib class.

trans-unit.source: The source code in this section is a shortened repeat of the longer Program.cs file presented earlier.
trans-unit.target: The source code in this section is a shortened repeat of the longer Program.cs file presented earlier.

trans-unit.source: All the retry logic and all the exception handling has been removed.
trans-unit.target: All the retry logic and all the exception handling has been removed.

trans-unit.source: The short version makes it easier to see the ADO.NET calls, knowing that these usually work.
trans-unit.target: The short version makes it easier to see the ADO.NET calls, knowing that these usually work.

trans-unit.source: Usually no transient faults occur and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Usually no transient faults occur and no exception is thrown.

trans-unit.source: And usually a skydiver does not need a backup parachute.
trans-unit.target: And usually a skydiver does not need a backup parachute.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Client quick-start code samples to SQL Database</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Client quick-start code samples to SQL Database</linkText><title></title>
